contentrichtext.text: {{notability|date=November 2011}} '''HaXml''' is a collection of utilities for parsing, filtering, transforming, and generating [[XML]] documents using [[Haskell (programming language)|Haskell]]. Its basic facilities include: * a parser for XML, * a separate [[error-correcting]] parser for [[HTML]], * an XML validator, * pretty-printers for XML and HTML. ==External links== * [http://haskell.org/HaXml HaXml home page] [[Category:Free software programmed in Haskell]] [[Category:XML parsers]]
